Scenario: You are staying at a hotel for several nights.
Majority Behavior: Most guests in this hotel choose to reuse their towels during their stay.

Scenario: You are in a university cafeteria at lunchtime.
You are attending a public lecture on climate change.
Majority Behavior: Most attendees sign a petition supporting environmental policies.

Scenario: You are in a group fitness class.
Majority Behavior: Most participants opt for the more challenging exercise routine.

Scenario: You are at a company meeting to decide on a new team project.
Majority Behavior: Most colleagues support adopting a new workflow software.

Scenario: You are at a local community clean-up event.
Majority Behavior: 75% of volunteers choose to stay for the entire duration of the event.

Scenario: You are in a movie theater choosing seats.
Majority Behavior: 80% of people select seats near the back of the theater.

Scenario: You are at a tech workshop after lunch.
Majority Behavior: 70% of participants return early to secure front row seats.

Scenario: You are at a conference with several parallel sessions.
Majority Behavior: 85% of attendees choose to join the keynote session instead of the breakout discussions.

Scenario: You are at a friend's birthday party with a buffet.
Majority Behavior: 75% of guests go for the desserts before trying the main dishes.

Scenario: You are at a local library during a book sale.
Majority Behavior: 60% of visitors choose to buy mystery novels.

Scenario: You are at a park during a weekend picnic event.
Majority Behavior: 70% of families choose to sit near the playground.

Scenario: You are at a shopping mall during a holiday sale.
Majority Behavior: 80% of shoppers choose to visit the electronics section first.

Scenario: You are at a music festival with multiple stages.
Majority Behavior: 90% of attendees choose to watch the main stage performances.

Scenario: You are at a beach during summer vacation.
Majority Behavior: 85% of visitors choose to rent umbrellas and chairs.
